        public boolean isBattling()
        Are we engaged in a battle?
        Returns:
        True if we are at least in one battle

      • isBattling

        public boolean isBattling(int battleId)
        Are we engaged in a battle with that particular battle ID?
        Parameters:
        battleId - the battle ID
        Returns:
        true if we are a player of the battle with the battle ID

        public boolean isOnAnyChannel(int pid)
        Is the player in any of the same channels as us?
        Parameters:
        pid - the id of the player we are interested in
        Returns:
        true if the player shares a channel with us, false otherwise

      • onPlayerLeaveChannel

        public void onPlayerLeaveChannel(int pid)
        Called by a channel when a player leaves. If the player is not on any channel and there's no special circumstances (as in PM), the player will get removed
        Parameters:
        pid - The id of the player that left
